texts.val: You can set your name here
This is a an online white board to annotate pictures and discuss together 💪
You are in the room named "Demo", you can create as much rooms as you like ! Each new room will have its dedicated URL
Each room is composed of "layers" which can each hold a background picture to annotate together
If somebody is on the board with you, you'll be able to see their live movements and actions 👀 ! And they will be able to see yours too
You can create an infinite amount of annotations by clicking the "New text" button
Once placed, a new text can be edited  in its style (menu display on hover👆) or in its value (2️⃣double-click)
For safety, you can save the current board on your computer and load it later.
Also, the idle rooms are removed after 2 weeks without any actions on them, so be aware ! ⚠
Another image to annotate and discuss together !

layers.name: Just guess the number of this layer
double click to edit the name of a layer
